content:
You're welcome! Categorizing your cases and screen protectors by type is a great starting point. It'll make it easier to find what you need and prevent clutter. Storing them in a small container or case organizer is a fantastic idea, too. It'll keep them protected and prevent scratches or damage.

Remember to also clean your cases and screen protectors regularly to keep them looking their best. A soft cloth and some gentle soap and water should do the trick.

Rotating your cases every few months is a great way to keep your phone looking fresh and prevent wear and tear on a single case. You can also consider switching up your case to match your mood, outfit, or season. It's a fun way to express your personality and add some personality to your phone.

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, have fun organizing your phone case and screen protector collection, and enjoy your new glittery case!
